span.div: The New York State Department of Health has published a guidance document for parents on the Coronavirus.Â Â Please review the letter by clicking here.Â Â

Additionally, the District would like to assure the school community that our nursing staff and administration is receiving regular guidance from both NYS and Federal health agencies.Â Using this expert information, we will be equipped to respond should there be local outbreaks of the virus.Â More communication will be shared with the school community as recommended by NYS and Federal health agencies or by the school district's physician.
Below please find a number of other valuable, related resources:

div.p: Center for Disease Control 2019 nCoV website:Â https://www.cdc.gov/nCoVÂ Â https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/summary.html
NYS Department of Health Novel Coronavirus Hotline 1-888-364-3065
NYS Department of Health Novel Coronavirus WebsiteÂ https://www.health.ny.gov/diseases/communicable/coronavirus
New York State Department of Health Local Health Departments:Â Â https://health.ny.gov/contact/contact_information/
New York State Center for School HealthÂ www.schoolhealthny.com
